title: Second Poro Icon in Worlds Pick'Em
body:
This is my first time making one of these but I was curious when the second icon gets delivered to you when you reach over 34 points in Worlds Pick'em.
I have 38 points but I haven't received it in 2 days :c
Is anyone else having this issue?
{{item:3070}}

replies.body: It took my friend about 4-5 days to get his. Hopefully yours will come sooner.

Hey Ualach, 

You may wanna give in one more day and if it doesn't show up reach out to Riot Support, or send in a ticket so someone can take a look into it for you. 

Have good night! 

{{champion:25}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3157}}
I have 43 points and I still don't have it either. They said give it 3 days, but since I normally got my reward-stuff after less than a day, I'm starting to get worried.
I'm the same way. I got the first icon pretty quick. I'm nervous about not getting the second one because I was sure I wasn't going to get over 34 points but I did xDD
